entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Showers beginning overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light early this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late in the evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
